title: Queen

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Condemn one player and all their visitors
-You may prosecute the night after a player you condemned is lynched

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -You will learn who you condemned each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid the town of heritics and nonbelievers

desc:
Post 3261
*You are a magical royal who curses all dissenters*
